languages.text: "Лорд-инквизитор доверил мне наладить взаимодействие собранной им эскадры с силами флота Осознание. После этого мне поручено выполнять функции наблюдателя и исполнителя особых поручений".

"The Lord Inquisitor entrusted me with the task of forging an alliance between the assembled fleet and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-инквизитор доверил мне наладить взаимодействие собранной им эскадры с силами флота Осознание. После этого мне поручено выполнять функции наблюдателя и исполнителя особых поручений".

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Inquisitor tasked me with establishing an accord between the fleet he assembled and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."
traits.speaker: Aishara_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "The Lord Inquisitor tasked me with establishing an accord between the fleet he assembled and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."

languages.text: “大审判官大人委托我，要我进行协助工作，在已经集结的舰队与真理开拓者舰队之间建立联盟。等我的任务完成之后，我会作为观察员与特别成员采取行动。”
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor entrusted me with the task of forging an alliance between the assembled fleet and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."

traits.locale_text: “审判长大人委托我，要我进行协助工作，在已经集结的舰队与真理开拓者舰队之间建立联盟。等我的任务完成之后，我会作为观察员与特别成员采取行动。”
traits.speaker: Aishara_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a chargée de constituer une alliance entre la flotte assemblée et les forces de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Une fois cette mission accomplie, je devrai jouer le rôle d'observatrice et d'agent spécial. »
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor entrusted me with the task of forging an alliance between the assembled fleet and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."

traits.locale_text: « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a chargée de constituer une alliance entre la flotte assemblée et les forces de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Une fois cette mission accomplie, je devrai jouer le rôle d'observatrice et d'agent spécial. »
traits.speaker: Aishara_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターは集結した艦隊とコグニサンス艦隊との同盟を結ぶ任務を私に託された。この任務が完了したら、私は監視員兼特殊工作員として行動することになっているわ」
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor entrusted me with the task of forging an alliance between the assembled fleet and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターは集結した艦隊とコグニサンス艦隊との同盟を結ぶ任務を私に託された。この任務が完了したら、私は監視員兼特殊工作員として行動することになっているわ」
traits.speaker: Aishara_WarCouncil

languages.text: «El Lord Inquisidor me confió la tarea de forjar una alianza entre la flota que conformemos y los efectivos de la Flota Conciencia. Cuando complete mi misión, actuaré como una mera observadora y operativa especial».
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor entrusted me with the task of forging an alliance between the assembled fleet and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."

traits.locale_text: «El Lord Inquisidor me confió la tarea de forjar una alianza entre la flota que conformemos y los efectivos de la Flota Conciencia. Cuando complete mi misión, actuaré como una mera observadora y operativa especial».
traits.speaker: Aishara_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Der Großinquisitor hat mich damit beauftragt, ein Bündnis zwischen der versammelten Flotte und den Truppen der Erkenntnisflotte zu schmieden. Wenn diese Aufgabe abgeschlossen ist, soll ich als Beobachterin und Sonderagentin dienen."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor entrusted me with the task of forging an alliance between the assembled fleet and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."

traits.locale_text: Der Großinquisitor hat mich damit beauftragt, ein Bündnis zwischen der versammelten Flotte und den Truppen der Erkenntnisflotte zu schmieden. Wenn diese Aufgabe abgeschlossen ist, soll ich als Beobachterin und Sonderagentin dienen."
traits.speaker: Aishara_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu, toplanan filo ile Malumat Filosu kuvvetleri arasında ittifak kurma vazifesini bana emanet etti. Bu görev tamamlandıktan sonra gözlemci ve özel ajan olarak çalışmalarımı sürdüreceğim."
languages.original_text: "The Lord Inquisitor entrusted me with the task of forging an alliance between the assembled fleet and the forces of the Cognisance Fleet. Once this task is complete, I am to act as an observer and a special operative."
